text.jpText:
――ああ、そういえば。
次のダンスレッスンは、アンタらが
手本で踊るんだったな……。
text.enText:
――Ah, come to think of it, you two are going to be the models for our next dance 
lesson......

text.jpText:
ああ。先ほどその構成を練ってきたところだ。
……なあ、ラモーヌ。
text.enText:
Yeah. We were working on the steps for that 
just now......Right, Ramonu?

text.jpText:
私は貴方のアイディアに乗っただけ。
異論のないほど、完璧だったもの。
text.enText:
I was just going along with your idea. 
It's so perfect that I have no objections.

text.jpText:
異論のないほど？
“退屈なほど”……ではなく？
text.enText:
So perfect you have no objections? 
Don't you mean "So perfect that it's boring"?

text.jpText:
完璧さとは……人を退屈にさせ、
焦点をなくす。けれど、いいのよ……それで。
text.enText:
Perfection......makes people bored and lose 
their interest. Although, that's fine as well.

text.jpText:
人知の及ばぬほど全美だという、
証明になるもの。
text.enText:
It's proof that such flawlessness can't be 
fathomed and appreciated by the public.

text.jpText:
いや……授業の一環だから、
皆にも楽しんでほしいが……。
text.enText:
But......it's going to be part of our class, so I 
want everyone to have fun too......

text.jpText:
……ラモーヌ。なら私が“完璧だが
退屈ではない”プランを提案すれば……
アンタを奪えるか？
text.enText:
......Ramonu. If I can come up with something 
"perfect but not boring"...... Will you go with me instead?

text.jpText:
……私を満足させる、
自信がおありなら。
text.enText:
......Only if you're confident that you can 
satisfy me.

text.jpText:
悪いがシリウス、その提案は待ってほしい。
構成を練り直す……私と、ラモーヌとでね。
text.enText:
Sorry, Sirius. That has to wait. 
We're going to redo the dance steps...... 
Just me and her.
